formattedAddress: 330 W 34th St., New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: if I could give less than 1 star to this company I would.  I got hit by one of their insured taxi driver.  Tried to call them to file a claim.  Got through to one person after 30 mins wait.  After she tried to transfer me to another extension, the line got dropped completely.  Called 2 more time after...another hour wait...went straight to voice mail or disconnect right away.  I think this company want to stale things out to not pay out the claim.  Definitely the worst customer service i ever seen.

originalText.text: This is the worst company ever. A taxi hit our car and HE WAS DRUNK. Now our car is damaged you call this place no one picks up the phone! We get hang up no answer no anything while my husband has very bad back pain and our car is damaged! How can you be so irresponsible as not to answer or fix this problem!

originalText.text: Horrible insurance company, nobody picks up the phone. They insure high risk drivers and then shield themselves from the claims by not being available. How does New York State allow them to operate?
